name: GoaloftheDay
0: ”Alexa, what is the Goal of the Day”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: what is the goal of the day
des: Everyday, Goal of the Day will give you a new, simple task to make your day a little bit more productive. These tasks are very manageable and can give each day a new and interesting story to talk about. Hear about other peoples' stories! If you want a shoutout shoot an email to AlexaGoalOfTheDay@gmail.com and hear your story on the goal of day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
